original_text: One time, when Jesus and his apostles were together, he said to them, ‘Do not leave Jerusalem yet. You must wait there until you receive my Father's gift. My Father promised to give it to you. I have already told you about it.
korean_text: 사도와 함께 모이사 그들에게 분부하여 이르시되 예루살렘을 떠나지 말고 내게서 들은 바 아버지께서 약속하신 것을 기다리라

sentences.original_text: One time, when Jesus and his apostles were together
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 때, 예수와 그의 사도들이 함께 있을 때

sentences.original_text: until you receive my Father's gift
My Father promised to give it to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지께서 그것을 너희에게 주시겠다고 약속하셨다

sentences.original_text: I have already told you about it
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이미 그것에 대해 너희에게 말했다
